<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">/// llvm&#95;shutdown - Deallocate and destroy all ManagedStatic variables.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">/// IMPORTANT: it&#39;s only safe to call llvm&#95;shutdown() in single thread,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">/// without any other threads executing LLVM APIs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">/// llvm&#95;shutdown() should be the last use of LLVM APIs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
